TOTAL RIP OFF! €50 We waited 1 hour for a small plate of mediocre "Jabugo" ham. Spanish ham should be cut thing by hand (it is also ok with machine if is a leg without bone) but this was so thin that you could see your fingers through it when holding it. Very small plate, 5 pieces of "Pa de vidre" (thin bread with scrubbed tomato) and small plate off thin cheese (it was "sweeting") and 3 "medianas" for drink.
